short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension displays the url to which the redirect would have occured. Choice wisely if you want to proceed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension was created to mitigate threats like XSS or CSRF using an url shortener service. This extension will prompt you with the target url of the shortened url before the redirect occurs. You then can choice if you want to proceed or cancel the redirect.
